summary: Senior network engineer and automation specialist with hands-on experience operating Extreme Networks switching in a service-provider environment (Legacy Bresnan ISP at Charter) and leading site redesign / hardware refresh projects. Blend vendor-agnostic design with Python/Git-driven guardrails. Strong in VLAN/stacking/LACP and OSPF/BGP on EXOS; deep EVPN-VXLAN experience on Juniper/Cisco translates to Extreme campus fabric patterns. Comfortable writing migration runbooks, pre-/post-checks, and rollback plans.
skills:
Extreme Networks (EXOS, ExtremeSwitching), VLANs, LACP/Link Aggregation, Stacking, OSPF/BGP, Configuration Standardization, Code Upgrades, Site Redesign & Hardware Refresh, Change Windows & Rollback, Documentation & SOPs
Fabric concepts (campus segmentation/virtualization); familiarity with Extreme Fabric Connect patterns; deep EVPN-VXLAN on Juniper/Cisco
Security: RADIUS/TACACS+, 802.1X concepts; NGFW/IPS exposure
Automation & Tooling: Python (PyATS, Netmiko, Paramiko), Git/GitHub, CI/CD, REST/JSON/YAML
Observability & Docs: SolarWinds, Splunk, SevOne, automated Visio generation
Cloud fundamentals: AWS/Azure/GCP networking (coursework & labs)
education: Associate of Applied Science, Information Technology (Network Specialist) — Madison Area Technical College — 2015
certifications:
Cisco Certified Network Professional Routing and Switching (CCNP-RS) — Issued 2016, expired 2022
Juniper Networks Certified Internet Professional Service Provider (JNCIP-SP) — Issued 2019, expired 2022 — Completed prerequisites and sat for JNCIE-SP

experiences.title: Network Specialist I
experiences.summary: Special assignment supporting the Legacy Bresnan ISP footprint running Extreme Networks switching; executed site redesign and hardware refresh with EXOS-based stacks.
bullets: Hands-on with Extreme Networks switching (EXOS): configured VLAN segmentation, stacking, and LACP uplinks; validated OSPF/BGP adjacencies where applicable.
Planned and executed site modernization and hardware refresh across multiple locations: code upgrades, port mapping, standardized templates, and change windows with rollback.
Wrote migration runbooks and pre-/post-change validation checklists (interface health, MAC/ARP tables, routing neighbors, syslog/alarms).
Automated Visio diagram generation with Python to accelerate documentation; mentored field techs on RFC 2544 testing and cutover readiness.

experiences.title: QA Automation Software Engineer (Networking)
experiences.summary: Contract via Insight Global. Built PyATS-based validation and Python tooling for FTTH lab networks (Juniper/Nokia), producing reusable pre-flight checks and regression suites.
bullets: Developed PyATS automation and Python tools (ixnetwork_restpy, Netmiko, Paramiko) for lab certification and change safety.
Established GitHub workflows with PR reviews and Jira branching; delivered demos translating test results to go/no-go decisions.

experiences.title: Network Engineer III
experiences.summary: Automation-first network engineering for hyperscale datacenter turn-ups (via Apex Systems).
bullets: Published configuration data to AWS version-control repos; scripted Linux host and Juniper TOR provisioning.
Diagnosed routing/optical issues applying BGP/OSPF and DWDM/SONET fundamentals.

experiences.title: Network Administrator
experiences.summary: Maintained global infrastructure; stood up internal Cisco ACI lab and documentation (via Hays).
bullets: Racked/stacked ACI lab; earned 40 Cisco CE credits; maintained monitoring and config hygiene.
Collaborated in a follow-the-sun model to minimize downtime.

experiences.title: Senior Network Engineer
experiences.summary: Modernized supercomputer management networks (via Mainz Brady Group) with design, automation, and temporary overlays under supply constraints.
bullets: Redesigned topologies to remove STP loops; advocated Clos designs; standardized configs in Git.
Authored Python generators to produce device configs from spreadsheets across multiple system families.

experiences.title: Network Developer II
experiences.summary: Delivered Blue Planet MDSO automation and CI/CD pipelines for zero-touch service workflows.
bullets: Added Cisco ASR 9000 automation and Python telemetry to reduce troubleshooting time.
Aligned agile ceremonies across software/network teams to accelerate delivery.

experiences.title: Network Engineer II
experiences.summary: Planned and deployed MEF services; hardened access controls and mentored engineers.
bullets: Hardened Cisco ACS command restrictions, preventing trunking outages; mentored 20 engineers on TACACS failover and packet analysis.
Co-developed JS config forms and Git workflows improving configuration accuracy.

extras:
Projects — juggling_coach: Python video-analysis toolkit (Claude Shannon theorem) with CLI and demo.
Projects — Austin Events Today: Web-scraping utility that reorders events chronologically.
Projects — TechYes Public Learning Channel: ~1,000 videos on networking, Python, AI, and MBSR.
Community — Mentor, Agile Learning Institute (2023-present); Juggler, Texas Juggling Society (2017-present).
